docTitle.titlePart:
Method of Construction
of the Green's Functions
in Momentum
Space for Unrenormalizable
Interactions

front.div:
A unitary method is developed for constructing the Fourier transform of the two-
point Green's functions in local and nonlocal theories with unrenormalizable
inter-
actions. The spectral representations of these functions are derived. It is shown that the
functions considered have a logarithmic branch point with respect to g for g = 0 in the
momentum space.
